summary: Excellent QD-OLED TV for any usage. Its main strength is its incredible brightness and vibrant colors, making it fantastic for HDR content and bright rooms. It's also a top-tier gaming TV.
A slightly less bright version of the S95F, but offers much of the same fantastic performance for a lower price. A great value high-end OLED.
Samsung's flagship 8K TV. It offers incredible brightness and stunning detail with its 8K resolution, making it a showcase piece for native 8K content.
A fantastic TV for bright rooms and gaming. Its Mini LED backlight delivers impressive brightness to overcome glare, and it has a great set of gaming features.

A unique lifestyle TV that displays artwork when you're not watching it. It has a matte screen to reduce reflections and look more like a real painting. Picture quality is decent, but its main appeal is its design.
LG's flagship OLED, designed to be wall-mounted. It features MLA technology for incredible brightness, making it one of the best-performing OLEDs on the market.
The most popular OLED for a reason. It offers a fantastic balance of price and performance, making it a great choice for movies and gaming.

A wireless OLED TV. All inputs connect to a separate Zero Connect box, which transmits the video and audio to the screen wirelessly. It offers the same picture quality as the G4 but with the added benefit of a clean, wire-free setup.
A top-tier QD-OLED with fantastic picture quality and Sony's class-leading processing. It excels at movie-watching with stunning color and detail.
Sony's flagship Mini LED TV for 2024. It's incredibly bright and has a new backlight system for better contrast and less blooming. A great alternative to OLED for bright rooms.
Offers amazing performance for its price. It gets exceptionally bright, making it a great choice for bright rooms, and has deep blacks for a good dark room experience.
Hisense's flagship ULED TV. It's one of the brightest TVs on the market, with an incredible number of local dimming zones for excellent contrast.
A flagship Mini LED TV that gets incredibly bright, delivering stunning HDR highlights. It's a great choice for a bright living room and for immersive HDR movies or games.
An older model that still represents fantastic value. It was one of the first TVs to bring Mini LED backlighting to the mainstream, offering great brightness and contrast for its price.
Vizio's flagship 4k TV. It gets very bright and has a wide color gamut, making HDR content pop. A strong competitor in the upper mid-range LED TV market.
Samsung's QD-OLED TV with excellent gaming performance and 144Hz refresh rate. Perfect for gamers who want OLED picture quality with high frame rate support.
Excellent value TV with high refresh rate and good HDR performance. Great for budget-conscious buyers who want gaming features.
Budget-friendly LG TV with Dolby Vision support. Good entry-level option for casual viewing with decent picture quality.
Entry-level TCL TV with basic 4K and Dolby Vision support. Suitable for budget-conscious buyers who want basic smart TV features.
Sony's premium OLED with excellent movie performance and processing. Perfect for home theater enthusiasts who prioritize picture quality.
Samsung's Mini LED TV with excellent brightness and gaming features. Great alternative to OLED for bright rooms and gaming.
LG's popular OLED with excellent gaming performance and G-SYNC support. Perfect balance of price and performance for most users.
Hisense's flagship Mini LED TV with excellent brightness and contrast. Great value for money with premium features.
TCL's Mini LED TV with excellent brightness and HDR performance. Great choice for bright rooms and HDR content.
LG's flagship OLED with gallery design and wall-mount optimization. Features MLA technology for incredible brightness and perfect blacks.
Samsung's most affordable QD-OLED model with excellent color performance and gaming features. Great entry point to OLED technology.
Budget-friendly Hisense TV with Dolby Vision support and good value for money. Perfect for casual viewing and basic smart TV needs.
Samsung's entry-level QLED with good brightness and smart features. Great for bright rooms and everyday viewing.
LG's premium OLED with excellent brightness in bright environments and vibrant colors in game mode. Perfect for mixed usage.
Samsung's flagship 8K QLED with excellent upscaling and incredible brightness. Perfect for large rooms and premium viewing experience.
Samsung's premium 4K QLED with excellent brightness and contrast for bright environments. Great alternative to OLED with gaming features.
Samsung's latest QD-OLED with vibrant colors and deep blacks. Features 144Hz refresh rate for excellent gaming performance.
TCL's mid-range QLED with good performance and QLED technology. Excellent value for money with solid gaming features.
Sony's flagship LED TV with excellent color accuracy and processing. Perfect for bright rooms and accurate color reproduction.
LG's QNED TV combining quantum dot and NanoCell technology for sharp picture quality. Good alternative to QLED with LG's processing.
Vizio's quantum color technology TV with wide color gamut and good HDR performance. Great value for money with solid gaming features.
Samsung's premium 8K QLED with incredible brightness and detail. Perfect for large screens where 8K resolution makes a difference.
LG's flagship 8K OLED with perfect blacks and incredible detail. The ultimate TV for premium home theater experiences.
Sony's flagship 8K LED with excellent upscaling and processing. Perfect for large rooms with excellent brightness and color accuracy.
Sony's flagship QD-OLED with exceptional color reproduction and cinematic processing. Perfect for movie enthusiasts and premium viewing.
Panasonic's Hollywood-tuned OLED with exceptional movie performance and Dolby Vision IQ. Perfect for cinema-quality viewing.
Philips OLED with Ambilight technology and Bowers & Wilkins sound system. Creates immersive viewing experience with ambient lighting.
Vizio's affordable OLED with excellent value for money. Great entry point to OLED technology with solid gaming performance.
Samsung's lifestyle TV that displays artwork when not in use. Features slim design and Art Mode for interior decoration.
LG's QNED TV with webOS 7.0 and Full Array Dimming. Excellent smart features and good picture quality for bright rooms.
Sony's mid-range LED with Google TV OS and excellent processing. Great balance of features and performance for most users.
TCL's QLED with Roku TV OS and intuitive interface. Great value for money with solid smart TV features.
Hisense ULED with VIDAA U6 OS and fast app loading. Good performance and smart features at an affordable price.
Samsung's budget LED TV with solid basic features. Perfect for casual viewing and basic smart TV needs at an affordable price.
LG's entry-level LED with 4K resolution and smart features. Good value for money with webOS platform.
Sony's budget LED with sharp picture quality and basic smart features. Reliable performance for everyday viewing.
TCL's ultra-budget LED with excellent value for money. Perfect for basic TV needs with Roku TV platform.
Hisense's budget LED with 4K resolution and Android TV. Great value for money with solid smart TV features.
Samsung's Neo QLED with high brightness and anti-reflection coating. Perfect for bright rooms with excellent gaming performance.
LG's QNED with NanoCell technology and sharp colors. Good alternative to QLED with LG's processing and smart features.
Sony's LED with bright panel and wide viewing angles. Great for bright environments with Sony's reliable processing.
TCL's QLED with high brightness and vibrant colors. Excellent value for money with good gaming features.
LG's OLED with deep blacks and cinematic picture quality. Perfect for movie enthusiasts with excellent dark room performance.
Samsung's QD-OLED with wide color gamut and excellent gaming performance. Great balance of features and picture quality.
Panasonic's OLED with movie mode optimization and excellent color accuracy. Perfect for cinema-quality viewing experience.
Philips OLED with Ambilight technology for enhanced immersion. Creates ambient lighting that matches the content.
Samsung's iconic design TV with unique aesthetic appeal. Perfect for interior decoration with distinctive Serif design.
LG's rollable design OLED with space-saving innovation. Features OLED evo technology with unique rollable form factor.
Sony's compact OLED with sophisticated design. Perfect for smaller spaces with premium picture quality and elegant aesthetics.
TCL's Mini LED with slim bezel and modern design. Features 1000 nits brightness with sleek aesthetic appeal.
Hisense's OLED with thin profile and premium design. Great value OLED option with solid performance and modern aesthetics.
Samsung's QD-OLED with enhanced color reproduction. Great entry point to OLED technology with excellent gaming features.
LG's flagship OLED with MLA technology for incredible brightness. Features wall-mount optimization and perfect blacks.
Sony's Mini LED with enhanced contrast and brightness. Features Cognitive Processor XR for excellent picture quality.
TCL's Mini LED with 144Hz refresh rate and gaming optimization. Excellent choice for gamers with high frame rate needs.
Hisense's ULED with dual cell technology and improved contrast. Great value for money with solid gaming performance.
Samsung's entry-level QLED with good brightness and smart features. Great for bright rooms and everyday viewing.
LG's NanoCell TV with various sizes and good color accuracy. Features webOS platform with solid smart TV features.
Sony's LED with reliable performance and Google TV OS. Good choice for everyday viewing with Sony's processing.
TCL's 5-Series QLED with good value for money. Features Roku TV platform with solid performance for the price.
Hisense's LED with various size options and Android TV. Great value for money with solid basic features.
